name: Wave Wand 3-Barrel Hair Waver 1 u00bcu201d
about: What it is:A three-barrel wand that makes styling the effortless, frizz-free Aussie beach waves a breeze..Hair Type:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Texture:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Frizz.Key Benefits:- Easy to use.What Else You Need to Know:The tourmaline ceramic and ionic technology leave hair smooth, frizz-free, and evenly styled. The adjustable temperature setting is for any hair type and texture.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Appy Heat Protect Spray (sold separately). .-Turn on wave wand and select your desired temperature. .-Section hair and start on the base of the neck, working your way up to the top layers of hair. .-Clamp a small section of hair near the scalp (without touching). Hold for a few seconds, release, and move down the hair shaft to ends. .-Repeat until the full head is complete. .-Finish style with Sea Salt Texture Spray (sold separately)..-Pro tip: Alternate sections between the Wave Wand and a curling iron for a fun, textured look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone with thin, straight hair that has a hard time holding a curl, this worked amazing in my hair. After two days my hair still looked great. Very happy with this wave wand

reviews.review_title: A new wave of hair fun ;)
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the dramatic yet natural look! Super easy to use even with shorter hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this waver. Whats nice is it has it to where you can alter the temperature unlike other brands, it comes with a hand mitten to make sure you dont burn yourself and gives you the most beautiful waves. My hair doesnu2019t hold curls at all but with the waver it held all day even through my workout! I give this a 10/10. Iu2019m also a hairstylist and I love using it on my clients to give them beachy waves.

reviews.review_title: So amazing. Best tool in my arsenal.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I canu2019t imagine how anyone is rating this tool low. Itu2019s the best thing ever, my hair never looks better than when Iu2019ve styled my hair with it. It holds until I shower again, doesnu2019t even need hairspray. You can avoid the u201ccrinkleu201d line by not having the crease right against your hair and using the took perpendicular to the floor and not parallel with the floor.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was very excited to try this waver out. Unfortunately even on a high heat setting and holding it for the directed amount of time, it just barely waved my hair. I guess I was expecting more out of it, I feel I can achieve better waves with my $30 Revlon curling wand lol.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this thinking it would be a quick and easy way to give my hair a loose wavy look without having to use the curing iron. This did absolutely nothing to my hair, no wave, nothing and on the highest heat setting. Returned

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gives the prettiest beachy waves. It's really easy to use and isn't damaging to the hair. I love the way it makes my hair look! I plan to use this for that beachy look this summer.

reviews.review_title: Works great on super thick hair!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was super excited to try this product from BondiBoost as itu2019s difficult to find a tool that can handle a large amount of my hair at once. This was super easy to use and heated up really fast. I liked how youu2019re able to see the actual temperature and set it to your liking. The longer you clasp the hair in it, the stronger the wave effect. It definitely gives beach-y wave vibes and I will be using it again!

reviews.review_title: Beware! Filter out incentivized review before buy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: BEWARE! This is the absolute worst. Fries your hair.  I bought it based on the reviews then after I used it once thought wth and looked again at the reviews only to find out they are mostly all incentivized!  I was very mislead Sephora!    And now I missed the 60 day exchange window by 2 days because I thought it was based on delivery day so now Iu2019m stuck with this thing :(  super disappointing because I wanted to love some texture in my fine straight hair but now every time I use this I will be stressing over the damage I am doing To my hair.  I would have went with the better brand if I knew before that incentivized reviews are included here.  I guess Iu2019m old and when I started ordering influencers werenu2019t a thing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I found this tool a bit tricky to use. It feels so big and heavy, it was hard to negotiate. I can do my hair in about 5-10 mins with a big barrel curling iron and this took my way longer. Not for me / the less skilled hair folks out there lol.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This waver works great but the only annoying thing is the placement of the on/off button. The waver is heavy and to maneuver I found I kept accidentally turning the waver off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have gone through at least five different 3-barrel wavers (to include Hot Tools, Bed Head, and Revlon) and this is BY FAR my favorite. I have very long hair that usually has trouble getting any volume and this waver gives me volume like you wouldn't believe. Some people say the buttons are in a weird spot and they keep turning the thing off... I thought the same thing until I realized it has a locking feature if you hold down the temperature button when you get it to the temp you want. Boom. Problem solved. After I realized how much I love this waver I bought a second one because I want to make sure I have another on hand, should this one ever stop working. 100% I would recommend this to anyone who wants beachy waves with lots of volume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not a paid review!! I genuinely love this hair tool. Last night was my first time using it and I absolutely loved it. The barrel is perfect size for longer hair, mines about 32u201d long. Not to mention how fast it heats up, lastly the extensive cord the waver comes with. Loved every aspect of this tool.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Very good product. The frizziness of my hair escape once I use this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This made beautiful waves in my hair but the button that turns it on and off is in the exact place where my hand is so every piece of hair I did I would turn it off. If it wasnu2019t for that I wouldnu2019t have returned it.

reviews.review_title: BEWARE: Got sent an open and used one.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I ordered this and got sent an open and used one. The cord was super messy right on top upon opening, the glove was out of the glove bag with the plastic bag just sitting on top of the safety manual that was sitting on top of the glove. There was also some product on the wand and it came off on my hand when I touched it. I very disappointed.

reviews.review_title: A MUST HAVE, Game Changing Hair Tool
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: THE absolute best hair tool ever!! This has been a game changer for my routine. I love curling my hair, but it normally only lasts one day and the next day it always has to be retouched. But not when I use this hair tool! My hair lasts up to 5 days (from wash to wash), never needs to be retouched, and is so cute! It makes my hair styles so much more versatile! As a mom to a 1 year old, it's made my life so much easier and so much faster to get ready. + it's extremely easy to use. It curls quick, it heats up fast, stays hot, and is very easy to maneuver. I need every Bondi Boost Hair tool after trying this one!

reviews.review_title: A New Addition to my EveryDay Routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Where do I even begin to explain how amazing this tool is!! My hair is very thick and super long, so itu2019s been very difficult to find a tool that I can use on my hair that actually works. Not only did my hair hold the waves, but it took me less than an hour!!! Keep in mind my hair is past my elbows! I love the locking feature because it prevents you from accidentally turning off the tool, or turning the heat to high. Iu2019ve always wanted to have my hair with beach waves, and I feel that this tool accomplished that. I highly recommend if your looking for a reliable and affordable tool!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love my new wave wands tool from bondiboost! The barrels are the perfect size for bold waves. I can have more defined curls or mermaid waves. The clamp really grips well. The sleek design is easy to hold and use. Easy instructions. I work an inch away from the scalp and continue to the end. I am able to do this without much effort and time. It does come with a heat glove. I am so happy I found the perfec r hair tool. I highly recommend!

reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this waver after trying it out on my thick hair! I chose the larger barrel for a softer beach wave look and this product gave exactly what I was looking for! It was super simple and easy to use, and the locking feature made it so that you can't accidentally press any buttons once you get started, which was a life saver! I am always looking for a new way to get perfect waves that will hold and this accomplished just that. I definitely recommend giving this waver a try if you also want those beach like waves too!

reviews.review_title: I absolutely love the Bondi Boost Wave Wand!
reviews.review_text: It's incredibly user-friendly and creates the most gorgeous, natural-looking waves.  The quality of the Wave Wand is top-notch. It feels sturdy and well-made, giving me confidence that it will last for a long time. Additionally, the heat temperature is perfect, allowing me to achieve beautiful waves without causing damage to my hair.  Overall, I highly recommend the Bondi Boost Wave Wand. It combines ease of use, stylish aesthetics, excellent quality, and just the right heat temperature to create stunning waves. It's definitely become an essential part of my hair styling routine.

reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE this waver! It is so easy to use and holds the curls for multiple days even without any product. reviews.review_text: This product is so amazing! So easy to use and gives such a nice wave to your hair that lasts for days. I never thought Iu2019d prefer this over a curler but it gives such a nice beachy wave that looks so effortless and trendy!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE LOVE LOVE! I expected to love this wand because ands Bondi Boost, but itu2019s even better than expected! Itu2019s not super heavy, it creates the best beach wave ever and it holds! It doesnu2019t fall flat before you get your entire head done.   Super impressed with it. If youu2019re debating on it , do it. Itu2019s my go to wave wand.
